channel.title: Comments on: The Better You Get, Seems the Worse Things Are – Thursday, June 22

item.title: By: Debbie Pollak (daughter of Sarah Pollak)
item.dc:creator: Debbie Pollak (daughter of Sarah Pollak)
item.description: Good morning Sue, After not being able to walk for 5 days, I finally gave into another cortisone shot in my right knee. I am trying to return to water aerobics class on Tuesday. I have missed three weeks and it is awful. i will work hard to get stronger again so I can drive out to see you again. I am so sorry that I have been unable to do this. I had a battle with the Kaiser people because they cannot understand what "living alone" means. I know you understand this all too well. I finally packed my knee with ice and got to see someone to get the shot. Now I am getting better but it is only temporary. Please do not think I have been neglecting you. YOU are very important to me and your friendship is a treasure for me. Hopefully, this week will go well and I can see you the week after this one. I am doing my best to be stronger. Love and a huge hug, Debbie
item.content:encoded:
Good morning Sue,
After not being able to walk for 5 days, I finally gave into another cortisone shot in my right knee. I am trying to return to water aerobics class on Tuesday. I have missed three weeks and it is awful. i will work hard to get stronger again so I can drive out to see you again. I am so sorry that I have been unable to do this. I had a battle with the Kaiser people because they cannot understand what “living alone” means. I know you understand this all too well. I finally packed my knee with ice and got to see someone to get the shot. Now I am getting better but it is only temporary.
Please do not think I have been neglecting you. YOU are very important to me and your friendship is a treasure for me. Hopefully, this week will go well and I can see you the week after this one.
I am doing my best to be stronger. Love and a huge hug, Debbie
